data.name: King's Bounty: Legions | True Tactician Ultimate Pack
data.detailed_description:
A balanced starter pack for King's Bounty: Legions players.
Take command of a squad of powerful creatures, enjoy fine artifacts and Royal Aura for 30 days -- and all at a discount!

This pack was gathered based on recommendations from the top King's Bounty: Legions players. It contains units that go best together.
If commanded masterfully, an army like this will help you defeat most of the opponents you encounter.

Use the collection recommended by the top players, and lead your army to victory!
Thorn Hunters will provide cover fire. Eyebeasts will help by supplementing ranged attacks with their sleep-inducing ray. Nimble and agile pirates can burst through the enemy ranks. Speedy and powerful Night Wolves can replenish their own health. Powerful Ancient Ents will send swarms of wild bees at the enemy, revive their allies and improve defense for several turns.

Artifacts in the pack are selected to complement the squad's strengths, granting the maximum bonus to its stats.

Purchase the pack brought to you by King's Bounty: Legions finest tacticians!
You will receive standard Hero's gear, a collection of 5 types of carefully selected creatures to form a battleworthy army, and Royal Aura for 30 days.

Creatures in the pack:

  • 9 Ancient Ents;
  • 25 Eyebeasts;
  • 17 Night Wolfs;
  • 125 Thorn Hunters;
  • 100 Pirates.

Artifacts in the pack:

  • Moon Sword;
  • Shield of the Ancients;
  • Armor of the Ancients;
  • Runed Belt;
  • Horned Helm;
  • Golden Sandals.

Royal Aura provides:

  • +100% gold;
  • +10% leadership;
  • x2 resources drop chance per each fight.

data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Korean, Polish, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any graphic card with 1 GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: none
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any graphic card with 1 GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: none

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.8
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any graphic card with 1 GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: none
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.8.5
  • Processor: Dual Core 2Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any graphic card with 1 GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: none
